name: grabber
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device with two parts that open and close on the end, used for taking hold of or picking up things: I added a metal pot grabber to my kit to grab and lift cans and metal pots off the fire. The probe has a tiny, alligator-jawed grabber . See also
litter grabber
someone who takes an opportunity to get, use, or enjoy something quickly: They've locked up a lot of illegal loggers and land grabbers who burn land. In every era the power grabbers promise safety from what people most fear.
(also attention grabber) something or someone who makes you pay attention: The title itself is quite a grabber. The opening work was the evening's real attention grabber .headline grabber The six Mitford sisters were headline grabbers in the 1930's and 40's.
